title: I\'ve noticed that there are still a lot of campaign signs up alongside public roads.  Whose responsibility is it to remove these, and how long do they have to do so?
text:
There are no specific rules under state election laws regarding

removal of signs, however, local zoning ordinances can be used to

enforce removal of signs in a public right of way.

Here are a couple of links with more information:

http://www.nhcgov.com/AgnAndDpt/ELCT/Pages/FrequentlyAskedQuestions.aspx
